title: OLFA Rotary Cutter RTY-2/G
description: The OLFA 45mm Classic Rotary Cutter is the original rotary cutter invented in 1979. Quality design and construction make this the perfect tool for projects big and small. Features include a blade slide safety cover and handle that is designed to reduce hand fatigue. Accommodates both right- and left-handed users.Whether you are a quilter, garment sewer, cosplay artist, or general crafter the OLFA 45mm rotary cutter is great for cutting a variety of materials such as fleece, felt, cotton, wool, foam, among others. This package contains one 45mm rotary cutter. RTY-2/G, 9651. Imported.
